title: Force acting on a conducting bar in magnetic field

content.prompt: The figure above shows a metal bar that is supported by two sections of a fixed, conducting U-shaped horizontal rail. The rod and rail are located in a region of magnetic field B directed into the page. The bar is moving to the right at a constant speed. Which of the following is true of the horizontal forces acting on the bar?

choices.label: There is only an external applied force.
There is both a magnetic force and an external applied force.
Nothing can be said about the forces without knowing the magnitude of the magnetic field.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
